dreams.title: Flying Over Mountains
dreams.body: I was soaring above snow-capped peaks, feeling the wind beneath me. The freedom was incredible. I could control my altitude just by thinking about it. Saw eagles flying alongside me.

dreams.title: Lost in a Maze
dreams.body: Endless corridors that kept shifting. Every door led to another hallway. Felt increasingly anxious. Walls were made of mirrors showing distorted reflections.

dreams.title: Ocean Depths
dreams.body: Swimming deep underwater, could breathe normally. Discovered an ancient city covered in coral. Glowing jellyfish lit the way. Met a friendly dolphin who guided me through ruins.

dreams.title: Childhood Home
dreams.body: Back in my old house but everything was slightly wrong. Furniture in wrong places, extra rooms that didn't exist. Parents were there but younger. Felt nostalgic and confused.

dreams.title: Concert in the Sky
dreams.body: Attended a massive outdoor concert on floating platforms among clouds. The music was unlike anything I've heard. Colors emanated from the instruments. Everyone was dancing on air.

dreams.title: Chase Through City
dreams.body: Being pursued through dark alleyways. Never saw who was chasing me. Could run incredibly fast and jump over buildings. Heart racing the entire time.

dreams.title: Library of Infinite Books
dreams.body: Discovered a library that went on forever. Every book contained someone's memories. Spent hours reading fascinating lives. The librarian was an owl who could talk.

dreams.title: Garden of Giants
dreams.body: Everything was enormous - flowers taller than trees, butterflies the size of cars. I was tiny, exploring this massive garden. The colors were overwhelmingly beautiful.

dreams.title: School Exam I Forgot About
dreams.body: Classic anxiety dream. Realized I had a major exam I hadn't studied for. Couldn't find the right classroom. When I found it, the questions were in a language I couldn't read.

dreams.title: Time Travel Market
dreams.body: Wandered through a market where vendors sold moments from history. Could buy and experience historical events. Purchased a moment from ancient Rome, felt completely real.

dreams.title: Foggy Forest Path
dreams.body: Walking through dense fog in a forest. Could barely see a few feet ahead. Heard whispers but couldn't make out words. Eventually emerged into a beautiful meadow at sunrise.

dreams.title: Painting Came to Life
dreams.body: In an art gallery when the paintings started moving. Stepped into a Van Gogh and walked through Starry Night. The paint had texture and the stars really swirled.

dreams.title: Conversation with Future Self
dreams.body: Met myself 20 years older. We talked for what felt like hours about choices and regrets. They were kind and understanding. Woke up feeling peaceful.

dreams.title: Underground River
dreams.body: Found a hidden entrance to caverns with an underground river. The water glowed blue. Followed it for miles, discovering crystal formations and ancient cave paintings.

dreams.title: Phone That Wouldn't Work
dreams.body: Needed to make an urgent call but phone kept malfunctioning. Buttons wouldn't press right, screen glitched, wrong numbers dialed. Growing frustration throughout.

dreams.title: Dragon Rider
dreams.body: Riding a massive dragon over a fantasy landscape. Could feel the wind and heat from its breath. We flew through canyons and over castles. The dragon spoke to me telepathically.

dreams.title: Empty Stadium
dreams.body: Alone in a massive stadium. Explored locker rooms and secret passages. Found a control room where I could manipulate the lights and sounds. Gave myself a concert.

dreams.title: Shapeshifting
dreams.body: Discovered I could change into any animal. Became a bird, then a dolphin, then a wolf. Each transformation felt completely natural. Spent the dream experiencing different perspectives.

dreams.title: Mirror Dimension
dreams.body: Stepped through a mirror into a reversed world. Everything was backwards. People walked on ceilings. Trying to navigate was disorienting but fascinating.

dreams.title: Tornado Warning
dreams.body: Massive tornado approaching. Trying to get family to safety. Everything in slow motion. The tornado had a face and was speaking, but couldn't understand the words.

dreams.title: Moonlight Picnic
dreams.body: Having a picnic on the moon with friends from different times in my life. Earth hung huge in the sky. We laughed and shared stories. The food tasted perfect.

dreams.title: Talking to Animals
dreams.body: Woke up able to understand and speak to animals. Had deep conversations with my pet, wild birds, a wise old turtle. They had so much to say about how they perceive the world.

dreams.title: Childhood Treehouse
dreams.body: Back in the treehouse from when I was young, but it was massive inside. Room after room of childhood memories and toys. Found items I'd forgotten existed.

dreams.title: Building Collapsing
dreams.body: In a skyscraper when it started crumbling. Running down endless stairwells. Others panicking around me. Made it out just as it fell. Watched it collapse from a distance.

dreams.title: Crystal Cave Concert
dreams.body: Musical performance in a cave made entirely of crystals. Each crystal produced a different note when touched. The whole cave became an instrument. Created beautiful melodies.

dreams.title: Invisible for a Day
dreams.body: Woke up invisible. Explored places I'd never get to see normally. Watched people when they thought they were alone. Felt both powerful and lonely.

dreams.title: Desert of Glass
dreams.body: Walking across a desert where the sand was made of glass. Reflections everywhere. The sun created rainbows in every direction. Found an oasis that was also made of glass.

dreams.title: Late for Work
dreams.body: Classic stress dream. Overslept and couldn't find clothes. Car wouldn't start. Traffic was impossible. Phone died. Everything that could go wrong did.

dreams.title: Floating Islands
dreams.body: Explored a world of floating islands connected by bridges of light. Each island had a different ecosystem. Jumped from island to island, discovering new creatures and plants.

dreams.title: Grandmother's Kitchen
dreams.body: In my grandmother's kitchen. She was cooking my favorite meal. We talked about everything. She gave me advice about current problems. Felt her love strongly. Woke up crying.

dreams.title: Shadow People
dreams.body: Figures made of shadow following me everywhere. Not threatening, just present. Eventually started communicating through gestures. They seemed to be guardians of some kind.

dreams.title: Time Loop Cafe
dreams.body: Stuck in a cafe where the same hour kept repeating. Initially frustrating, but learned to appreciate the details. Started changing small things to see effects. Eventually broke free.

dreams.title: Breathing Underwater
dreams.body: Discovered I could breathe water like air. Swam to the deepest parts of the ocean. Met bioluminescent creatures. Found underwater caves with air pockets containing ancient civilizations.

dreams.title: Car With No Brakes
dreams.body: Driving down a mountain road when brakes failed. Picking up speed. Trying to steer around obstacles. Eventually crashed into hay bales. Shaken but unharmed.

dreams.title: Bookstore of Worlds
dreams.body: Each book in this store was a portal to a different world. Spent the dream jumping between stories. Became characters, lived their lives. Time moved differently in each book.

dreams.title: Missed Flight
dreams.body: At airport, couldn't find gate. Security lines endless. Kept getting lost. Watched plane take off without me. Had to figure out what to do stranded.

dreams.title: Firefly Festival
dreams.body: Night festival where millions of fireflies created patterns in the sky. They responded to music and emotions. The whole crowd dancing together, fireflies swirling above in harmony.

dreams.title: Room of Doors
dreams.body: Empty room with hundreds of doors. Each led to a different memory from my life. Could step into and relive moments. Some doors were locked, couldn't remember what was behind them.

dreams.title: Giant in the City
dreams.body: Grew to enormous size, hundreds of feet tall. Carefully navigating the city trying not to step on anything. People weren't scared, they were curious. Helped rescue a cat from a tree.

dreams.title: Haunted House Tour
dreams.body: Giving tours of a haunted mansion. The ghosts were friendly and helped with the tour. They shared their stories. One ghost was a former tour guide from the 1800s.

dreams.title: Paint Reality
dreams.body: Had a paintbrush that could paint reality itself. Whatever I painted became real. Started small with flowers and birds. Eventually created entire landscapes. The power was exhilarating.

dreams.title: Teeth Falling Out
dreams.body: Classic anxiety dream. Teeth started feeling loose, then falling out one by one. Tried to catch them but they kept coming. Looked in mirror and was horrified. Felt so real.

dreams.title: Cloud City
dreams.body: Living in a city built on clouds. Buildings made of solidified mist. Jumped between clouds like trampolines. The sunset turned everything gold and pink. Met cloud shepherds tending flocks of storm clouds.

dreams.title: Basement That Goes Forever
dreams.body: Exploring the basement of my house, but the stairs kept going down. Each level was different - storage, then workshop, then ancient catacombs, then caves, then finally glowing minerals.

dreams.title: Frozen Moment
dreams.body: Time froze but I could still move. Walked through the frozen world. Studied people mid-action, mid-expression. Birds suspended in flight. Eventually figured out how to unfreeze it.

dreams.title: Beach at Night
dreams.body: Walking on a beach under stars so bright they cast shadows. Bioluminescent waves. Found messages in bottles from different eras. Each contained a story from someone's life.

dreams.title: Gravity Reversal
dreams.body: Gravity suddenly reversed. Everyone fell upward into the sky. Had to grab onto trees and buildings. Eventually learned to control which direction was 'down' for me. Flew by changing gravity.

dreams.title: Language of Music
dreams.body: Everyone spoke in music instead of words. Conversations were melodies and harmonies. Arguments were dissonant chords. Love was expressed in beautiful symphonies. I could understand it all perfectly.
